span.strong: For safety purposes, BHCSD and area districts are closed to students through May 15, 2020.
Board of Education Meeting for Tuesday, 4/21st has been canceled.
BH will not have vacation on 4/10/2020-4/17/2020. Expect your student to continute working during this time.

em.strong: Please continue check your junk email for an email from BH regarding an internet survey and correspondence from teachers.

span.strong: For any questions or concerns regarding the Coronavirus please call Samaritan Medical Center's COVID-19 hotline at 315-755-3100. The hotline is open from 7 am - 11 pm seven days a week.

strong.span: Information from Jefferson County Public Health
